```{r}
sim <- function(i) {
  length <- 1
  vec <- c()
    while(i != 1) {
      vec[length] = i
      length <- length + 1
      if(i%%2 == 0){
        i <- i/2
      } else {
          i <- i*3 + 1 }
    }
  length
}
```

```{r}
out <-c()
for (i in 1:10000) {
  out[i] <- sim(i)
}
out

```


```{r}
hist(out)
```
```{r}
summary(out)
```
